projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: This project is my personal website/blog, which I created to showcase a more modern design and share my thoughts with others. You can find a brief introduction about myself, as well as information on the most significant projects I've worked on. Additionally, there's a blog section where you can read articles about technology.

rows.title: Articles
rows.subtitle: Hand crafted blog posts
rows.description: As someone who is passionate about all things technology, I love sharing my knowledge and insights with others. Whether it's discussing the latest trends and innovations in the industry, exploring new programming languages and frameworks, or sharing my own experiences with various tech tools and platforms, you'll find plenty of engaging and informative articles here.

rows.title: Projects
rows.subtitle: Made with love
rows.description: This section features my latest projects. For each project, you can find a brief description, the technology stack used to build it, stunning illustrations, and a link to learn more about it. If I deem it relevant, some of these projects will have a more in-depth presentation in the blog section.

rows.title: Astro
rows.subtitle: Blazingly fast
rows.description: I used Astro, a JavaScript web framework, to build this portfolio/blog. One of the key features that drew me to this framework was its speed promise. Since I didn't need a lot of interactivity, using a single-page application (SPA) framework like React or Angular would have been a waste of resources. My experience using Astro was fantastic, resulting in a blazingly fast portfolio. Therefore, I recommend using Astro whenever possible.
